comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12932?focusedCommentId=17355688) by David Li (lidavidm):*
I thought transactions weren't in the initial spec?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12932?focusedCommentId=17378173) by Kyle Porter (kylep):*
Just looking through this, and you're correct, there's no transactions in the initial spec.
